hoipolloi
Class Debug

java.lang.Object
  hoipolloi.Debug

public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object

This class was made to display to the default output device if set to on. Debug makes it easier to have println statements in your program that you can turn on and off from one location in any program.

Since:
Sep 19, 2006
Author:
Brandon Buck

          Prints a statement to the system provided that Debug is on.
static void turnOff()
          Turns the debug printer off.
static void turnOn()
          Turns the debug printer on.
